channel.title: Popular Culture on mjec's electric blogaloo
channel.description: Recent content in Popular Culture on mjec's electric blogaloo

item.title: Liking problematic media
item.description: Note: This post uses and discusses strong profanity, gendered and racist slurs. Last night at RC we had a karaoke night of sorts. I queued up Nosebleed Secction and the few Australians in the room sung it with great gusto. It’s the first time I’ve felt any kind of nationalistic sentiment since I’ve been here. There’s one particular sequence of lyrics which triggered the writing of this post: I wanna hear some lyrics when I wake up
